name: Artillery Spotting
description:
Work with your friend to find and destroy the target set of buildings before time runs out.

This was created for a class at TCNJ as a proof of concept with all primary features fully implemented.

Credits: Nicholas Parr, Robert Mineroff, Christopher Gollmer, Eric 0'Hare, and Isabel Bryant

Note:  This has been only tested to work locally.  If you get disconnected you can rejoin, however, it causes the timer to increase in speed each time.
